feed.title: Ente Photos Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: Auth v2.0.34
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix privacy screen colors by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/auth/pull/411
  • Update Authy guide by @greeeen-dev in https://github.com/ente-io/auth/pull/415
  • Optimized SVG icons for #405 by @nikunjkumarnakum in https://github.com/ente-io/auth/pull/418
  • Add Koofr icon by @iamgitcat in https://github.com/ente-io/auth/pull/423
  • Add some more icons by @iamgitcat in https://github.com/ente-io/auth/pull/430
  • Added Kite icon by @nikunjkumarnakum in https://github.com/ente-io/auth/pull/427
  • Fix Filen icon by @Eseltwift in https://github.com/ente-io/auth/pull/426
  • Add Lastpass Authenticator import by @kushagharahi in https://github.com/ente-io/auth/pull/437
  • Add 6 new icons by @sv3nnie in https://github.com/ente-io/auth/pull/436
  • add icon for notesnook by @forthcoming73 in https://github.com/ente-io/auth/pull/443
  • Export fixes by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/auth/pull/445

New Contributors

  • @iamgitcat made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/auth/pull/423
  • @kushagharahi made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/auth/pull/437
  • @forthcoming73 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/auth/pull/443

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/auth/compare/v2.0.30...v2.0.34

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.8.70
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Widgets on Android by @prateekmedia
  • Redesigned Discovery tab by @ashilkn
  • Location clustering by @ua741
  • Bug fixes & performance improvements

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.8.74
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1239
  • Share an Album to Multiple Contacts at Once by @ashilkn https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1116
  • Add support for viewing HEIC images with proXDR by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1171
  • Bug fixes and performance improvements

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.8.75
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove unused global keys by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1309
  • Allow for configuring a custom server by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1302

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.8.74...photos-v0.8.75

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.8.81
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Change share page copy by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1323
  • Perf test on app init by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1366
  • Allow manual upload of videos when global video upload is disabled by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1384
  • Fix active plan highlight by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1388
  • Use sqlite async for fetching all files for search by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1391
  • New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1282
  • Use sqlite async for fetching files for gallery by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1397
  • Minor fixes for semantic search by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1412
  • New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1420
  • Upgrade flutter by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/1434

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.8.75...photos-v0.8.81
